item.title: How would i add a timer to a boss rep++
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

well im back. and i came up with this:(this is for delta but im sure you can fix this up to make it for PIâ€¦ im pretty sure this works)

first make an int:

then make a void:

public void timerSpawn() { if (timerSpawn > 0) { timerSpawn -= 1; } else if (timerSpawn == 0) { timerSpawn = 10; server.NPCHandler.spawnANPC(NPCID, XXXX, YYYY, HEIGHT); }
remember to change to the correct NPCID, coordinates and height.

next make an area in which your npc are in using this boolean:

public boolean inMiniGame() { if(absX >= lowerX && absX <= higherX && absY >= lowerY && absY <= higherY) { return true; } else { return false; } }
again, make sure you change the coordinates

now go to public boolean process and add:

if(inMiniGame()) { timerSpawn(); }

i think that should be it
